meanings.sent1: The wise woman shared stories from her eld.
meanings.sent2: In his eld, Grandpa enjoyed peaceful days in the sun.
meanings.sent3: At the eld gathering, they played bingo and laughed.
meanings.sent4: The eld of winter brought a quiet stillness to the land.
meanings.sent5: Her face showed the marks of eld, but her eyes sparkled with wisdom.

meanings.definition: A period of time long past.
meanings.sent1: Legends from eld speak of brave knights and dragons.
meanings.sent2: The eld of the dinosaurs is a fascinating topic for scientists.
meanings.sent3: In the eld of ancient history, mysteries abound.
meanings.sent4: The eld of the Roman Empire shaped the world we know today.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the eld of the pharaohs reveals wonders of the past.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are older or more experienced.
meanings.sent1: The council of eld advised the young king on matters of state.
meanings.sent2: In the eld of scholars, she was respected for her knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The eld of mentors guided the new employees with care.
meanings.sent4: Among the eld of artists, his talent shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The eld of astronauts shared stories of space exploration with the students.
